author: daxian-dbw
body: I changed `v6.0.0-alpha.12` to `v6.0.0-alpha.11` in our examples so that we don't need to filter them when updating the package labels in our docs for next release.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: /cc @PowerShell/powershell-maintainers Please review the updates when you have time. We will update the doc again when we finally get to the point that we can automate the whole release process.

title: Update releasing doc to include steps to create Linux/macOS packages and NuGet packages
